text: Pyotr Viktorovich Khrustovsky (; born 31 May 1979 in Kamyshin; died 5 July 2003 in Volgograd Oblast in a traffic accident) was a Russian football player. His last club, FC Ural Sverdlovsk Oblast, has retired his number 23. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:People from Kamyshin Category:2003 deaths Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Ural Yekaterinburg players Category:FC Rubin Kazan players Category:Road incident deaths in Russia Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players
title: Pyotr Khrustovsky
